intro: Rungia tenuissima, commonly known as the slender rungia, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa and Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many ornamental and economically important plants. The plant is characterized by its small, delicate leaves and clusters of tiny white or pale yellow flowers. It typically grows as an erect shrub or herb, reaching heights of up to 1 meter. Rungia tenuissima is often cultivated for its ornamental value and is adapted to thrive in moist, shaded environments.
